item.title: SevenSeg
item.description: A Digital Number Scanner App Have you ever found yourself waiting for a microwave, and wished you could walk away and get a reminder when its done? Or maybe you are vision-impaired and would like an app to read aloud how much time is left on the machine. That’s what this app is for. Devices such as microwaves, washing machines, and ovens often have electronic seven-segment displays to indicate how long until the machine is done (the ones in my house do, at least).
